explains: n. 一种油，醋，盐，香料等合成的浓烈调味品；香料嗅瓶

sentences.en: Peas will discolour in contact with the acids in vinaigrette.
sentences.cn: 豌豆与香料酸接触后会褪色。

sentences.en: Prepare Passion Fruit Vinaigrette by mixing olive oil, passion fruit juice, shallot and dill together. Add salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.cn: 制作热情果汁调料，将橄榄油，热情果汁，葱和莳萝叶搅拌在一起。并加入盐和胡椒粉进行调味。

sentences.en: Orzo Salad with Tomatoes, Feta, and Basil vinaigrette.
sentences.cn: 用小西红柿，乳酪，和含有罗勒的调味料调制而成的米粒沙拉。
